H0.text: Which Russian composer wrote the ballets 'The Stone Flower' and 'Romeo and Juliet'. Sergei Rachmaninoff

H1.text: Which Russian composer wrote the ballets 'The Stone Flower' and 'Romeo and Juliet'. Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov

H2.text: Which Russian composer wrote the ballets 'The Stone Flower' and 'Romeo and Juliet'. Dmitri Shostakovich

H3.text: Which Russian composer wrote the ballets 'The Stone Flower' and 'Romeo and Juliet'. Prokofev

A4.text: The ballet Romeo and Juliet—from which 'Dance of the Knights' is taken—was created by Sergei Sergeyevich Prokofiev
